headline: Evaluating Salesforce (CRM) After Recent Share Price Weakness And Perceived 26.9% Undervaluation
summary: Salesforce (CRM) is back in focus after recent share price weakness, with the stock showing negative returns over the past month and past 3 months. This has prompted investors to revisit its fundamentals and current valuation. See our latest analysis for Salesforce. Zooming out, the recent share price pullback, including a 22.57% year to date share price decline and a 42.56% one year total shareholder return decline, suggests momentum has faded even though the three year total shareholder...
